Related repos

  • generates 4k cinematic videos from text or images
  • Open-source text-to-video generation model and tools
  • Multimodal foundation models for video understanding
  • Next.js SaaS platform for AI video generation
  • Curates research on video generation for world modeling
  • open suite of AI video foundation models for text-to-video, image-to-video, video editing, text-to-image, and video-to-audio tasks
  • Skywork R1V: multimodal reasoning model extending R1-series LLMs to images and text, open-source, efficient transfer, 38B parameters
  • code for 3Blue1Brown math video animations
  • turn any mp4 video into a 3d point cloud in real time
